name: Hide user images and condense messages in Slack
description:
Completely hides user images. Also removes usernames from consecutive messages by any specific user.

Works with other Slack themes.
additional_info: 14 May, 2018 - Fixed classes that were changed by Slack. - Removed the styling to condense consecutive messages as this seems to be built-in by Slack now. 17 Feb, 2017 - Increased message left-margin from 10px to 30px to show the quotation marks on quoted replies.
